attributes.action: Tell the public what drugs are at risk in the event of a no deal Brexit
attributes.additional_details: There is a great deal of untrustworthy information in the media. The government has a responsibility to inform the public. If some drugs and treatments are at risk then patients have a right to know. If not, then give us factual information that supports that view.
attributes.background: People are already rightly concerned that there are life saving drugs and treatments that may be unavailable under a no deal Brexit. Give the public this information so that patients, relatives and carers can make informed plans for their immediate futures.
